gaussian[source]

gaussian(x, m, b, A, sig)

Function used to fit gaussian in peak_detection :param x: float, input data for curve :param m: float, slope of the data :param b: float, intercept of the data :param A: float, curve amplitude :param sig: float, standard deviation of curve :return: float
